1.06.name: wordpress/google-sitemap-plugin
1.06.description:
With the Google Sitemap Plugin you can create and add a Sitemap file to Google Webmaster Tools, and get the info about your site in Google Webmaster Tools.

FAQ Support

Translation

  • Arabic (ar_AR) (thanks to Albayan Design, hani aladoli)
  • French (fr_FR) (thanks to Jeff)
  • Russian (ru_RU)
  • Serbian (sr_RS) (thanks to Diana, http://www.wpdiscounts.com)
  • Spanish (es_ES) (thanks to Fernando De León)

If you create your own language pack or update the existing one, you can send the text in PO and MO files for
